code: import i18next from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import LanguageDetector from"i18next-browser-languagedetector";import en from"./en/translation.json";export const resources={en:{translation:en}};i18next.use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({fallbackLng:"en",resources,interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18next;
